attributes.review: I log in and the only thing I see are idiots at work... how stupid. Worst app of 2020
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: DONT DOWNLOAD this app, as soon as I installed it my phone froze!!! I tried to restart my phone and when I did my drop down menu wouldn’t work! There are glitches with this app!!!!! Beware!! (Side note I heard the people who made this app were racist, just FYI)
attributes.title: This app made my phone freeze!!!!

attributes.review: This app is so bad it took forever to download to my phone and when it actually downloaded like a month later my little brother saw some 🍊dude and was so scared he ran and hid , now this app has made my brother so scared to go to bed bc of the horrible face he had saw
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: It is astonishing how much glitches are in this app, and so many pop up ads. I believe it steals your information as well.... whenever I text the number, someone asks me for my location 😳 Horrifying app. It deserves 0 stars!!!
attributes.title: Can’t believe this is an app

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever seen. It took four days to download and after it was done it started playing music and rats started attacking me. I am terrified of rats than it asked for my credit card information next I’m getting charged for German chocolate
attributes.title: Horrible App😡😤

attributes.review: i opened up the app and was immediately bombarded with disgustingly ugly pictures of a deformed orange man, I suspect he is mentally challenged and should be sent the proper help because the things coming from his mouth are things only absolute baboons would say. Please do not download this app for your safety and mine.🙏😔
attributes.title: AWFUL DISGUSTING MOST HORRIFIC APP

attributes.review: If I could I would rate it 0 stars 😡 it took hours to download and literally caused my phone to glitch out terribly! I almost got a new phone bc of it. PLUS I have to look at the ugly orange man in my phone every time I open it I am immediately uninstalling this horrible app 🤢🤮🤮🤢🤮
attributes.title: WARNING DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app is SO STINKY AND GRIMY. It’s filled with lies and it almost killed my dog. I was in this app trying to get I formation when I got a virus on my phone!!! IVE NEVER BEEN SO MAD AND UPSET WITH AN APP BEFORE😡😡 IT NEEDS TO BE TAKEN OFF THE APP STORE. It spreads such bad things and I makes me so angry. IT ALSMOST KILLED ME. The worst app I’ve ever gotten 0/10 stars. Would not recommend. SO STINKY AND GRIMY.😡😡😡😡😡😡😤😤😤
attributes.title: This app is the worst thing 😡😡😡

attributes.review: i’m furious, right after downloading the app my phone instantly had viruses, my phone was tapped and it exploded!!! i had to purchase a brand new phone if i could put ZERO stars i would. also if u download this you’re automatically supporting a racist! scary!
attributes.title: worst app ever!!!!!

attributes.review: Once I downloaded this I thought I was gonna be able to get closer to my ra_ist king 👑 but no! When I download this I get random threats from oranges and their little orange peels saying “GIVE A GOOD REVIEW” I had to delete the app because my life was at risk I’m sorry ra_ist king I tried but did not succeed 😔😭
attributes.title: Tiktok lives matter 😡 💜💙🖤🤍
